data.name: Indirection
data.detailed_description:
With Indirection, there is no going back, literally!
With only one direction to move in, how will you get around?
Luckily, the massive testing facility you find yourself in has a solution for that!

Features

  • 16 challenging campaign levels with mind bending direction-based puzzles.
  • Steam workshop support with an infinite number of fan-created levels!
  • Built-in level editor to create your own puzzles!

Gameplay


  • Increasingly complex levels where you need to learn to think - one way or another.
  • Use swap machines to change your direction.
  • Jump through portals to teleport across the level.

  • Switch machines on and off to get through complex puzzles.

  • Difficult tests of platforming skill in every level!

data.short_description: A challenging, unique puzzle platforming adventure where you can only move in one direction!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Danish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 7, 64-Bit Windows 8.1, or 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz 64-Bit Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 730 equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz 64-Bit Quad Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 12.0.1 Monterey or compatible
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz 64-Bit Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 12.0.1 Monterey or compatible
  • Processor: 3 GHz 64-Bit Quad Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
